content: be the collar of the dress there is a front side and back side to the bodice the front side of the bodice is the right side of row 1 the braid from the chain is clearly visible with this side facing out when you fold the bodice in half and begin working on the skirt keep the right side out please note on the bodice of the dress the corner stitches are always worked into the chain 2 space
